channel.title: How do i change money color?
channel.description: please help.. and how would i had like type in 100m insted of 1000000

item.title: How do i change money color?
item.dc:creator: @DXRX DXRX
item.description:
@DXRX wrote:

<blockquote>private static String intToKOrMilLongName(int i) {
	String s = String.valueOf(i);
    for(int k = s.length() - 3; k > 0; k -= 3)
        s = s.substring(0, k) + "," + s.substring(k);

    //if(j != 0)
       // aBoolean1224 = !aBoolean1224;
    if(s.length() > 8)
        s = "@red@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 8) + " million @red@(" + s + ")";
    else
    if(s.length() > 4)
        s = "@cya@" + s.substring(0, s.length() - 4) + "K @whi@(" + s + ")";
    return " " + s;
}
 public final String methodR(/*int i,*/ int j)
{
    //if(i <= 0)
       // pktType = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
    if(j >= 0 && j < 10000)
        return String.valueOf(j);
    if(j >= 10000 && j < 10000000)
        return j / 1000 + "K";
    if(j >= 10000000 && j  < 999999999)
        return j / 1000000 + "M";
    if(j >= 999999999)
        return "*";
	else
	return "?";
}</blockquote>

^ That Method??

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change money color?
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:

ty so much sniper ur a life saver. i been busy adding stuff thanks so much. man. this server side or client side?

if (promptInput.toLowerCase().contains(“k”)) {
promptInput = promptInput.replaceAll(“k”, “000”);
} else if (promptInput.toLowerCase().contains(“m”)) {
promptInput = promptInput.replaceAll(“m”, “000000”);
} else if (promptInput.toLowerCase().contains(“b”)) {
promptInput = promptInput.replaceAll(“b”, “000000000”);
}

where would i place this two ?..

item.title: How do i change money color?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Here’s what you can add in client.java above whatever does the action for you: if (promptInput.toLowerCase().contains("k")) { promptInput = promptInput.replaceAll("k", "000"); } else if (promptInput.toLowerCase().contains("m")) { promptInput = promptInput.replaceAll("m", "000000"); } else if (promptInput.toLowerCase().contains("b")) { promptInput = promptInput.replaceAll("b", "000000000"); }
